data.name: Condemn
data.tooltip:
Brands enemies in target area with a glyph, reducing their movement speed by 50% and burning them for <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraCondemn_DoTDebuffDamage.amount / duckiesHeroPandoraCondemn_DoTDebuff.periodic_duration" style="Bold"/> damage per second.

When glyph is removed, either by expiring or by unit dying it will explode, dealing <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraCondemn_DamageRadius.amount" style="Bold"/> area damage.

Glyph lasts for <d ref="duckiesHeroPandoraCondemn_Debuff.duration"/> seconds.
